text.autoconfig.odyssey.title: Odyssey - Settin's
text.autoconfig.odyssey.option.items.@To: Changes to th' way yer items work
text.autoconfig.odyssey.option.items.ite: Stack Size Changes
Configure th' amount of treasure ye can hold
Seal Holdin' Capacity
Changes tha holdin' capacity of seals and hanged seals
Ship Holdin' Capacity
Changes tha holdin' capacity of ships and storage vessels
Landlubbers' Boat Holdin' Capacity
Changes tha holdin' capacity of Landlubbers' boats
Flag Holdin' Capacity
Changes tha holdin' capacity of flags
Flag Pattern Holdin' Capacity
Changes tha holdin' capacity of flag patterns
Booty Rack Holdin' Capacity
Changes tha holdin' capacity of booty racks
Festooned Vase Holdin' Capacity
Changes tha holdin' capacity of festooned vases
Ball o' Snow Holdin' Capacity
Changes tha holdin' capacity of Balls o' Snow
Cackle Fruit Holdin' Capacity
Changes tha holdin' capacity of Cackle Fruit
text.autoconfig.odyssey.option.items.mor: More of yer loot can be remedied
Cutters can be remedied usin' bullions o' steel, paintbrushes usin' feathers, and Poseidon's fightin' fork usin' shards o' prismarine
text.autoconfig.odyssey.option.items.sil: Soft Hands and Treasure on yer Cutters
Cutters can now be witchcrafted wit' Soft Hands and Treasure
text.autoconfig.odyssey.option.items.mob: Axolotl and Frog Buckets will display a tooltip on them with the type of Axolotl or Frog that is in them
text.autoconfig.odyssey.option.items.all: Allows for Potions of Mining Fatigue to be brewed using Elder Guardian Thorns
Allows for Potions of Haste to be brewed by inverting a Potion of Mining Fatigue with a Fermented Spider Eye
text.autoconfig.odyssey.option.blocks.@T: Changes to th' way yer blocks work
text.autoconfig.odyssey.option.blocks.an: Ye can remedy yer Slab o' fixin'
Cracked slabs o' fixin' can be remedied by right-clicking on them usin' a Chunk o' steel
text.autoconfig.odyssey.option.blocks.fe: Wind in yer breeches prevents destroyin' fertile land
Fallin' onto fertile land wit' wind in yer breeches will not destroy it
text.autoconfig.odyssey.option.blocks.li: Pond Plants can be right-clicked usin' Mashed bones to grow more of 'em nearby
text.autoconfig.odyssey.option.blocks.sp: Spore Flower o' Caves Plant Grubbin'
Spore Flowers o' caves can be right-clicked usin' Mashed bones to duplicate 'em
text.autoconfig.odyssey.option.blocks.sm: Usin' Mashed bones on a venus flytrap will drop 2 of itself when it growin' into a huge venus flytrap, makin' it so you can get more of it anywhere
text.autoconfig.odyssey.option.blocks.re: Pebble makers sunken lower than Y=0 will make tough pebbles instead of pebbles
text.autoconfig.odyssey.option.blocks.ha: Harder To Break Buddin' Purple Jewels
Buddin' Purple Jewels are no longer broken quicker by pickaxes in order to prevent sailors from accidentally breaking 'em
text.autoconfig.odyssey.option.blocks.sn: Sniffin' Beast Cackle Fruit Hatchin' No More
Cackle Fruits o Sniffin' Beasts placed upon Davy Jones's Heat will not be hatchin', which be useful for using 'em to decorate yer ship!
text.autoconfig.odyssey.option.blocks.un: Blocks of black powder will instantly blow up when nearby flames or when lit ablaze wit' Ship's bane or Cannonballs
text.autoconfig.odyssey.option.blocks.fl: Small Flowers can be right-clicked wit' yer empty hook to instantly drop their loot instead of having to destroy 'em in order to obtain 'em
text.autoconfig.odyssey.option.blocks.sn: Snow Layers can be right-clicked with a Shovel to harvest them to prevent accidental breaking of other nearby blocks
text.autoconfig.odyssey.option.blocks.pi: Movin' Arms can be right-clicked with a Ball o' Slime to turn 'em into a Piston o' Slime, and Pistons o' Slime can be right-clicked with a Hatchet to turn 'em into a normal Movin' Arm
Changes to th' way yer creatures work
Saddle Taking Off
Swines and Fish o' th' underworld can have their saddles taken off when right-clicked on while shiftin'
Not So Much Rabbit Fallin'
Rabbits will only be caus'd fall damge after fallin' 10 or more blocks
More Great Sea Lurkers
Sea lurkers that are struck be' the gods will sail into Great sea lurkers
Stand o' Armor wit' Arms
Yer booty rack can be right-clicked on usin' a piece o' timber to give it arms
Naggers perish along wit' their summoners
When an Summoner perishes, any Naggers that it had summoned will also sink wit' their captain
Cube o' slime and Cube o' magma reshapin'
Cubes o' slime upon Davy Jones's Heat will sail into Cubes o' magma after a short while, and Cubes o' magma in the bilge will sail into Cubes o' slime
Plunder frogs in yer pail
Frogs can be plundered wit' a empty pail
Plunder krakens in yer pail
Krakens and glowin' krakens can be plundered wit' a pail o' bilge
Hidden Flames Overlay wit' Flame's Bane
Tha flames overlay won't show on creatures or sailors wit' flame's bane
Booty Holder Waxin'
Filled Booty holders and Glowin' booty holders can have honey net put onto them to prevent yer crew from rotating 'em
Booty Holder Snippin'
Filled Booty holders and Glowin' booty holders can be snipped wit' cutters to make tha frame part hidden
Better Brumby HUD
When sailin' on a creature, the sailor's hunger bar will now properly show on yer in-game HUD
Improved Horses
Horses wearing Leather Horse Armor are now able to walk on Powder Snow, and Horses, Donkeys, Mules, and Camels will now all ignore leaf collisions while being ridden
